articles.title: Stuart Broad quits cricket by creating unique record in 5th Ashes Test - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Stuart Broad created a unique feat on Day 5 of the fifth Ashes Test against Australia, which was also his last day international match. | Cricket
articles.content: Ashes 2023 came to a close on Monday, also bringing an end to Stuart Broad's illustrious career in professional cricket. The England pacer had announced on Saturday that the fifth Test at Kennington … [+2134 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Former childcare worker in Australia charged with abusing 91 children - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Investigators arrested the man, 45, after discovering graphic child pornography posted on dark web. The police traced clues to childcare centre in Brisbane. | World News
articles.content:
An Australian former childcare worker has been charged with abusing 91 children in what police described Tuesday as one of the country's "most horrific" child sex abuse cases.
